description: Float Valley is a sensory deprivation/floatation center located in Markham, ON across from Markville Mall. We have 6 floatation cabins each filled with 10 inches of temperature neutral Epsom saltwater allowing you to float effortlessly. The cabin blocks out light and sound allowing you to relax on a very deep level. Floating is great for athletes, pain relief, creativity and mental health!

reviews.title: Float/infrared sauna
text: First time floating. The staff was extremely knowledgeable and passionate about every service offered, which translated into an amazing, welcoming and relaxing experience. Definitely worth trying!

reviews.title: Experienced float. sauna, ice bath, treatment room space.
text: Floating after the sauna for sure gave me 60% more Mg than orally ever could. Calming from stillness is my moksha, expansion of my quads to unbind from femoral artery, and decompression of my spine all leads to an excellent experience as a compass needle in a chill space with violet flame fireplace.

reviews.title: A unique, incredible experience!
text: If you haven't floated before, I would highly recommend doing so at this location! The facilities are incredibly clean, spacious and the atmosphere is calm and inviting. As a first time floater, everything was explained to me in detail to make sure I was comfortable and informed. Floating gave my mind a complete sense of calm and awareness I didn't know I was capable of whilst awake and unoccupied and I immediately felt the benefits of it in my work and personal life afterwards. What an INCREDIBLE experience, thank you Float Valley!! This has definitely become a part of my self-care toolkit and I will definitely be back again very soon.

reviews.title: Infrared Sauna for the win!
text: Had another great experience at Float Valley this week! Got to try out their new Infrared sauna before my float session and it was incredible. It has Netflix inside and the option to connect your own music. Very different than the traditional sauna in the way you detox and sweat also causing you to lose 600 calories in 30 mins. If you haven't heard of floating before I encourage you to check out their website : floatvalley.com and go try a session. Floating is great for pain relief, meditation and relaxation.

reviews.title: Mind & Body Relaxation
text: I absolutely love floating. I have tried everything to help with my rib, neck and back pains and nothing seemed to help.. that is, until I found floating! After every float I feel amazing. Float Valley is beautiful. The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable. They make the environment very relaxing and comfortable. They also keep everything super sparkly clean which is a major plus. I would definitely recommend trying Float Valley if your in town for some mind and body relaxation, therapeutic energies and healing.

reviews.title: "life-giving for the body, mind, heart and spirit"
text: "My wife and I just finished our float session. This was her first, and my second. We had an incredible experience. The staff were friendly and the facility is clean, inviting, and calming. For those floating for the first time, it can be a bit of an adjustment. For me, it was like an hour of forced meditation, in a sensory-free environment. And the feeling of weightlessness was rejuvenating for my joints and muscles. We live in a sensory-rich environment. Investing this one hour was life-giving for the body, mind, heart and spirit. I highly recommend Float Valley to anyone looking to temporarily escape the stresses of the modern world."

This review was written last year. We have since returned as often as our schedule allowed. We continue to recommend Float Valley highly and can't wait for the next appointment. Which reminds me, I need to schedule my next session!

reviews.title: Just what I needed.
text: My 2 year old son and I have tagged along on one of my husband's  business trips, and it hasn't  been going well.  So, with such a stressful week this float was like heaven!  It was my first float, and though i was a bit rushed and stressed in the getting there, once I walked in I immediately began to relax.  I was welcomed by the owner, who has such a serene energy.  The place itself is beautiful and calming.
I was very impressed by the care taken to prepare me for my float: the information given (before I had even arrived) and all the things one could possibly need were neatly arranged in the room.
I loved the float!  I wish I could do this every day!  If you have not tried a float spa, and you can get to Markham, try this place.
I cannot believe how grounded and balanced I felt, a feeling that lingered with me, even through yet another tricky bedtime.
I think the world would be a better place if we could all get tonthis deep state of chill more often!
So...  try it!  Ooh, gift it too.. what an amazing gift this would be, especially for someone who has not tried it.

Pls note... for those who may tend towards claustrophobia, this place has a special option with a larger, more open float space.  It has lights you can control as well.   So everyone has access to this wonderful experience.
Thank you Float Valley for this beautiful experience.
Namaste

reviews.title: The most rejuvenating experience ever
text: Float Valley is the really the only place you can unplug in a city setting. It's floating cabins allow the mind and body to enter a different dimension - allowing all your senses to reset. You come out of the float chamber feel new, refreshed, mentally clear and most importantly refocused on what matters in life.
Highly Recommend it.

reviews.title: Float Valley
text: The best hour for me.
Float Valley is so inspiring place, I wanted to stay longer.
It is a escape from our busy and stressful life.

reviews.title: Clean Facilities, such a unique experience!
text: Float Valley is a beautiful & clean float location that walks you through the float experience step by step! I had never tried floating before and I really appreciated how their website answers all questions and concerns + more with their detailed FAQs. In additions, the owner, Nadeem is extremely knowledgeable and willing to answer any questions.

The first time I experienced floating, I went with my best friend and we tried to Ocean Cabin (recommended for first time floaters). Really spacious, love how there is an option to control the lights inside, and I felt safe the entire time. After our experience, we freshened up and blowdryed our hair in the vanity area, and then proceeded to check out the lounge space and enjoyed tea, water, and colouring after.

The second time I went, I tried the Oasis Pod and I would say I prefer this! Much smaller and there are no lights but because it is dark right away, it was easier for me to get in the zone. It is more cozy and intimate and is said to simulate our experience of being in the womb. Floating in 800lbs of Epsom Salts is a unique experience and every time I go, I can never tell if my eyes are open or closed. Sensory deprivation is neat.

Honestly I think floating is worth trying at least twice. The first time you’re getting used to the feeling and then because you know what to expect, the second time is a lot more comfortable and in depth!
Oh! Something I love is the scent of their shampoo & conditioner in the showers after! Good quality stuff!

Be sure to try the Kava drink (helps you relax!) at least once! I tried it with my sister another time when I went and although there was a bit of a bitter aftertaste, we were so zen for the rest of the day.

I appreciate how the owner, Nadeem is always willing to learn more about the Float Industry. He attended a Float conference in Portland just last month it just shows how much he cares and is willing to learn from others in the field. Float Valley cares about making your experience enjoyable and I’m glad he has brought it to Markham. I’m excited to go again this week!

reviews.title: Great place to relax and rejuvenate
text: Staff here are fantastic.  They walk you through EVERYTHING, make you feel comfortable especially as a first timer.  Once you relax in your very private pod, you will feel all stress etc just "float" away.  The hour goes by quite quickly.  Give it a try.  You never know.

Even though you are in the pod by yourself, it may be fun to bring a friend so you can share your experience in the lounge area after.  They provide tea, water, coloring books (yes, you just never know) and books to write in... Perfect place to spend a couple of hours.

reviews.title: An Amazing Place to Relax Your Mind and Body
text: Floating relaxes the mind and body. This place is very nice and the staffs are very friendly. This place is operated by someone who respects and care about their customers.

reviews.title: Float Valley Review
text: Out of the four float centres I've been too, Float Valley by far was the most aesthetic, relaxing and overall best experience I've had floating so far.
The 'post float glow' was enhanced by the relaxation room and tea (I can't remember the specific name).
The vibe and cleanliness of this spot is unmatched!
Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Lifestyle Choice.
text: Once you go floating a few times it turns from a hobby to a lifestyle choice. I used to float because I thought it would help me deepen my meditation. It did that and loads more. I’ve been to a few different locations now, and spent dozens of hours in tanks. Would have to say without a doubt Float Valley is the best place to be if your serious about floating, or just dipping your toes in for the first time. Operated by someone who truly cares, great staff. 10/10.

reviews.title: Amazing Float Experience
text: I’ve been float for some years now and I have to say the setting and freandly staff made my float, the staff offered a free kava shot for my first experience and it helped me relax and get the full potential out of my float.
It was great after being overseas for business definitely 5* these guys know what their doing !
Regards
Charlie Gray

reviews.title: Excellent facilities, great customer service
text: Probably the most extravagant float center I've ever been to. Equipped with different styles of cabins, and plenty of space to hang out in for pre- or post- float times, whether you want to just relax with some water or do some yoga, there's a lot of room for you to express yourself. The float experience itself is amazing, with all the showers and amenities carefully laid out to be as convenient as possible. Highly recommend checking out if you want to go float yourself!

reviews.title: Top notch float centre! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
text: This facility is beautiful! There is a great atmosphere and friendly employees, this was my first float experience and I couldn’t have asked for a better first time!
All of the rooms were spotless, the tanks were brand new and nice. Had a great feeling after the float coming out and having some tea in the lounge.
Just all around great spot, wouldn’t hesitate recommending it to anybody!

reviews.title: What an experience..
text: Much more than I expected. This fantastic facility, accompanied by a great staff leaves you with a very relaxing and intimate experience. If this is your first or 100th time,  I wouldn't recommend any other place for sensory deprivation. The demonstration and atmosphere will dissipate any nervous feelings you had prior of coming in and I can say with confidence that you will share a very positive light on floating afterwards.
Thanks Float Valley !!

reviews.title: The most incredible experience!
text: The most incredible experience!

I tried my first float last week, and everything from start to finish exceeded my expectations! As soon as I walked in, I was greeted by three smiling faces who gave me a tour of the facilities, a pre-float orientation, and answered all questions I had! The float itself allowed me to relax both physically and mentally - I am still feeling the positive effects to date!

The staff, facilities and ambiance at Float Valley are exceptional. Nadeem, Alex and Alia are extremely knowledgeable and accommodating, really ensuring my first float experience was one to remember. I will most definitely be returning for another float in the near future. Thank you for bringing a little oasis of relaxation to our very busy lives!

reviews.title: Ellen Reesor
text: Float Valley is one if my favourite places tonrelax and unwind. I was a skeptic at first, but after trying it i was fully on board! Not only did my body and muscles feel like butter after floating, but my mind was grounded and clear. I find it really enhances my meditation practice and I have since gone back multiple times. I recommend float valley to everyone!

reviews.title: The perfect place for complete relaxation
text: I was so relaxed after that I had to take a moment to snap back to reality before driving home. Cruising along doing the speed limit the whole way home I couldn't care less about all the cars zipping by me in the fast lane.

The experience I had at Float Valley was the best float I've ever had! Nadeem and his staff are so friendly and helpful and the place looks amazing. As a strongman competitor, I float for recovery as well as visualization to improve sports performance. I tried floating in the Oasis tank this time around and I still had more than enough room at 6'6". I could have been a foot taller and a foot wider and still had lots of room to float. From the minute you enter the doors at Float Valley, this is the most relaxing experience I've had in a very long time.
